meanings.definition: (ルーマニア語)借金を返す、完済する
meanings.english_definition: (Romanian) to pay off a debt, to settle an account; to discharge an obligation.

examples.sentence: Trebuie să mă sdebitez de datorii.
examples.translation: I need to pay off my debts.
examples.english_translation: I need to pay off my debts.

examples.translation: He paid off his debt to the bank.
examples.english_translation: He paid off his debt to the bank.

collocations: sdebitare față de cineva (誰かへの借金の返済)

meanings.definition: (ルーマニア語、比喩的に)義務を果たす、責任を果たす
meanings.english_definition: (Romanian, figuratively) to fulfill an obligation, to discharge a responsibility.

examples.translation: I fulfilled the promise I made.
examples.english_translation: I fulfilled the promise I made.

examples.sentence: Trebuie să ne sdebităm de obligațiile față de țară.
examples.translation: We must fulfill our obligations to the country.
examples.english_translation: We must fulfill our obligations to the country.

collocations: sdebitare de o obligație (義務の履行)
sdebitare de o promisiune (約束の履行)

etymology.value: 派生語: de + debit (借金) + -are (動詞語尾)。ラテン語の"de-" (除去) + "debitum" (借金)に由来。

usage_notes.explanation: "Sdebitare"はルーマニア語の動詞で、主に金銭的な借金を返すことを意味します。比喩的には、約束や義務を果たすという意味でも使用されます。再帰動詞として使用されることが一般的で、"a se sdebita"という形になります。

examples.note: 再帰動詞なので、再帰代名詞（mă, te, se, ne, vă, se）が必要です。

readability_explanation.text: This entry describes the Romanian verb "sdebitare", meaning "to pay off a debt" or, figuratively, "to fulfill an obligation". It is generally used as a reflexive verb (a se sdebita).

example_sentences.sentence: Până la sfârșitul anului, vreau să mă sdebitez de toate creditele.
example_sentences.translation: By the end of the year, I want to pay off all my loans.

example_sentences.sentence: El s-a sdebitorat de promisiunea făcută de a ajuta familia.
example_sentences.translation: He fulfilled his promise to help the family.
